title._content: Image taken from page 275 of 'The Peak of Derbyshire: its scenery and antiquities. ... With illustrations by A. Dawson and H. Railton'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The Peak of Derbyshire: its scenery and antiquities. ... With illustrations by A. Dawson and H. Railton" Author: LEYLAND, John - of Forest Hill Contributor: DAWSON, Alfred - Artist Contributor: RAILTON, Herbert. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10368.g.42." Page: 275 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1891 Publisher: Seeley & Co. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 002159891 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
